be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.controllers.project

Class ListTasksController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.controllers.project.ListTasksController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListTasksViewController.Listener, java.util.Observer

    public class ListTasksController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ListTasksViewController.Listener, java.util.Observer
    ListTasksController class allows to view all tasks of a specific project, to delete a task and delegate the addition and modification of a task to EditTaskController.
